content: I have some all-day contractor stuff going on, so I'm almost certainly going to miss both of the meetings on Wednesday.
I'm not feeling well today, I might skip this meeting as well.
take care! hope you feel better soon :yellow_heart:

Let's use today to experiment a bit: let's try to handle things asynchronously without a video call and see how that goes. I'll summarize the most important things that are open here on Zulip, and we can use the time to handle them semi-async.
• There's quite a few (API) FCPs open. See https://rfcbot.rs/: BurntSushi (10), Amanieu (4), dtolnay (8), cuviper (1), m-ou-se (7), yaahc (12), joshtriplett (8)
• One open (API) regression: Stabilizing Iterator::intersperse breaks a large number of crates #88967
• Nominated API issue that needs discussion: Tracking Issue for const-initialized thread locals #84223
• PR that has been open for a year and was marked as nominated because of that: Add 'core::array::from_fn' and 'core::array::try_from_fn' #75644
• Nominated API issue about whether we want to have is_<variant>() methods for all enums: Add is_absent and is_unicode_error to VarError #89301
• Open FCP on std-dev-guide about the teams and team membership: std-dev-guide#28
• And finally, less urgent but important on-going work that's still open: Making/completing the overview of official rust-lang/* crates and their status: hackmd.
sounds good, I'm currently going through all my FCPs on rfcbot
